project.name: next-portfolio
project.description: Personal portfolio website built with Next.js 15, React 19, and TypeScript

conventions.fileNaming: camelCase for components, kebab-case for utilities
conventions.componentStyle: Server Components by default, 'use client' only when necessary
conventions.stateManagement: Zustand for client state, Server Components for server state

codeQuality: Prefer Server Components over Client Components
Implement proper error handling with logging
Add proper accessibility attributes (aria-labels, semantic HTML)
Use proper SEO metadata with generateMetadata
testing: Write tests for critical business logic
Use React Testing Library for component tests
